title: Its my birthday
body:
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} 
 Yo, broporo yesterday was my christmas and today is my birthday.Can you give me some rp to open chests or to buy skins at birthday party?

replies.body:
Here it is
EDIT for personal photos
http://i67.tinypic.com/20r76v5.jpg

Well, I was only expecting a little drawing of a poro or something but that cake looks pretty epic!!! Now I'm hungry for cake xD

Be sure to double check your RP the next time you login ^_^
You mean to shoot you a video of birthday party?
If you need a small amount of RP, I'm sure they can hook you up. Unfortunately, they don't often give out large amounts, especially amounts that could fully purchase an item or skin.
